item.title: Hi, I'm Patrick.
item.description: I am a software engineer based in Germany and currently working in backend @ Jodel. I’m also pursuing a master’s degree in computer science @ Karlsruhe Institute of Technology. Apart from drinking tea and reading Hacker News comments of highly varying quality, I love to code for fun. Check out Ryggio for example â€“ made by two lovely Swedish friends and me!
